info.title: Alan's Speakeasy
info.description: Full API for Alan's Speakeasy, Version 0.1

get.summary: Get the status of the current assignment generator
Gets the list of feedback averages (both assigned and requested) per user
Gets the feedback form (with form name and questions).
Gets the list of all feedback forms.
Gets two lists (assigned and requested) of feedback responses to this form
Gets the list of feedback responses for a Chatroom.

post.summary: Creates a group with existing, non-duplicate and at least one users.

get.summary: Lists all groups with corresponding users.

post.summary: Sets roles for session based on user account and returns a session cookie.

get.summary: Clears all user roles of the current session.

patch.summary: Add a user to an existing Chatroom.

post.summary: Post a message to a Chatroom.
Post a chat message reaction to a Chatroom.

get.summary: Get state and all messages for a chat room since a specified time
Lists all Chatrooms for current user
Lists all Chatrooms with pagination, ordered by descending startTime, filtered by users and time range.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number of rooms to return per page. If not specified, there is no limit.

parameters.name: timeRange
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of two timestamps UNIX MILLISECONDS to filter rooms by STARTING time range. If not specified, all rooms are returned.

parameters.name: userTuples
parameters.description: List of tuple in the format 'userId1,userId2' passed as repeated query parameters.This parameter contains the list of 2 tuples users that should be present in the chatroom. If not specified, all rooms are returned.If one userId is blank, it is considered as a wildcard

get.summary: Lists all assessed chatrooms for current user (including chatrooms marked as no need for assessment)
Export specified chatrooms as JSON or CSV. In case of CSV, a ZIP file is returned.

parameters.name: roomsIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of roomIds to export

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format of the export (json or csv, default JSON)

post.summary: Creates a Chatroom with another user.

get.summary: Returns details for the current session.
Returns details for the current session.

patch.summary: Changes the password for a given user.
